title: Envelope, Envelope for Faculty of Architecture Landscape and Design, University of Toronto, 1999
title_raw: Envelope for Faculty of Architecture Landscape and Design, University of Toronto
creditline: Gift of Bruce Mau Design Inc.
description:
Window envelope for Faculty of Architecture Landscape and Design at University of Toronto.
Recto: Clear plastic window for mailing address (1 1/8 x 4") at lower left with rounded corners.  At top left, continuing to back flap, imprinted in vertical orientation, "Faculty of/ architecture/ landscape, /and design/ university/ of toronto" (in silver).  
Verso: On flap, partial text on recto at top right.  Imprinted on top right, on back flap "Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, and Design/ University of Toronto/ 230 College Street, Toronto ON Canada M5T 1R2" (in black)

tombstone.epitaph:
Envelope, Envelope for Faculty of Architecture Landscape and Design, University of Toronto, 1999. Printed paper, plastic. 
Gift of Bruce Mau Design Inc.. 2000-58-3
